name: 6K Feet Under (KayoSilvaGD)
description:
Presentation

With your drill you have to dig in this strange planet plenty of native creatures to find a powerful source of energy.

In  order to  recharge your space drill ship, you're forced to explore this mazy cave searching for clues.

Controls

Move: WASD

Interaction: E

Change Weapon: Q/ Mouse Scroll

Reload: R

Shot: Left Mouse button

Aim: Right Mouse button

Sprint: Shift

Propulsion Jump: Space
